label: 一切経
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: The Buddhist canon. Tripitaka in Sanskirt. Also called the Daizō-kyō, or Jūnibu-kyō because it is divided into twelve sections. The eleventh section is called the Bifutsuryaku or Hōkō. [大蔵経、十二部経、毘仏略、方広]
